resources.string: Buy more songs of this band!

Here, people can choose a category which corresponds to their current mood - which in result will bring them another activity with a list of songs appropriate for selected mood. \n\n Users can also go to the marketplace where they can discover even more categories!

Users of the app can browse list of several songs for that particular category and they can choose to play them. \n\n I would probably go for the Android\'s MediaPlayer class to build fully functional activity. Multiple of that class methods provide out of the box manipulation of the video/audio objects, which could be useful in that kind of application.

User could view here some of the song details as well as band info. I would probably use some AsyncTask library features to get some interesting info about band. Maybe their tour dates etc. \n\n User would be also able to click on the button below and he would be takend to some sort of band website, or song rating portal.

User would be presented with bunch of new features that he could buy to power up their app. New songs in each categories, new categories with tons of new songs included in them etc. 

 Before buying user could click on one of the buttons below to view more details about the songs. 

 The most reasonable choice to execute the payment for these would probably be to use Android Pay API on user's click on the button below. It would charge user's Wallet and unlock new song/category in user app instance.
